body: The art was great, but when it comes to coloring those blue blood veins was creepy and disturbing imo.
2008 manga huh ? this reminded of some popular uncensored hentai animated films (same art like this) during that earlier years specially "The Hills Have Size "
Awesome!!!! I would have never expect someone to translate AND de censor a Taki work
Taki Minashika's Lovers was one of my first exposures to hentai.  Nice to see some of it's materials get some love again.

Well, this brings back memories. I never got the play the original game (Love Escalator), but I played the rerelase (LOVERS ~Koi ni ochitara~) and it is one of the most thorough games I've ever seen. Seeing Rie, Hinako and the other girl whose name I can never remember takes me back.
Classic! Used to have gifs of these girls
Man, this is some near-Satoshi Urushihara level.
